name: vscode-css-languageserver-bin
description: Binary version published on npm of vscode-css-languageserver extracted from VSCode tree
author: VSCode Langservers

scripts.build: cd vscode-css-languageserver && npm install && tsc -p . --outDir ../dist && cd .. && npm run addShebang
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run mergePackages && npm publish dist
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run mergePackages && npm pack dist
